<<<<<<< HEAD
The iust Italian Lately presented in the priuate house at Blacke Friers, by his Maiesties Seruants. D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.
[76] p.
Printed by Thomas Harper for Iohn Waterson, and are to be sold at the signe of the Crowne, in Paules Churchyard, London : 1630.
Dedication signed: VVilliam D'avenant. Signatures: A-I⁴ K² . The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

Printed by Thomas Harper for Iohn Waterson, and are to be sold at the signe of the Crowne, in Paules Churchyard, London : 1630.
Dedication signed: VVilliam D'avenant. Signatures: A-I⁴ K² . The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

the signe of the Crowne, in Paules Churchyard
